headline: Why Is Vishay Intertechnology (VSH) Stock Soaring Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturer Vishay Intertechnology (NYSE:VSH) jumped 6.8% in the afternoon session after the company's shares moved in sympathy with a broader rally in the semiconductor and AI infrastructure sector.

headline: Why MACOM (MTSI) Stock Is Trading Up Today
summary: Shares of network chips maker MACOM Technology Solutions (NASDAQ: MTSI) jumped 3.1% in the morning session after the stock rose amid a broader rally in semiconductor stocks following a key analyst upgrade for a peer company.

headline: Why KLA Corporation (KLAC) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor manufacturing equipment maker KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) jumped 4.4% in the morning session after Barclays upgraded the stock from 'Equal-Weight' to 'Overweight' and significantly raised its price target. The bank increased its price target on the shares to $1,200 from $750. Barclays named KLA its top pick among semiconductor equipment makers, viewing it as a leader in the wafer fabrication equipment space. The upgrade also reflected KLA having the "lowest China risk p
